amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph at the end of the bill that the plan required by paragraph (1) shall include a list of parcels planned to be offered for lease.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
